sentences: "Lähete kaasa?" – "Ei. Esiteks ei saa kolme kuud ära olla ja teiseks vajaksin puhkust ja rahu."
context: The word 'lähete' is the second-person plural present indicative form of the verb 'minema' (to go). It means 'you (plural) are going/leaving'. In the example sentence from Metsanurk, it's used as a question: "Lähete kaapa?" which means "Are you coming along?" or "Shall we go?"
